game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This Board class stores all the information about the current "game of life and death".
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    AvoQueen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int rows, int cols)
      Constructor for the Board class that creates a new Board-object with a minimum dimension / size of 3x3.

      • Board

        public Board(int rows,
             int cols)
        Constructor for the Board class that creates a new Board-object with a minimum dimension / size of 3x3.
        Parameters:
        rows - the amount of rows that the board has
        cols - the amount of columns that the board has

      • updateNeighbors

        public void updateNeighbors(Cell c)
        Updates the neighboring cells neighbor-count when one cell changed its status from active to inactive and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        c - cell that had its state changed
